traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.
traits.name: odyssean

traits.description: Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.
traits.name: ares'wrath

traits.description: Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.
traits.name: artemis'blessing

traits.description: So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.
traits.name: aphrodite'sgrace

traits.description: It is said that Timmy can leap the space between lightning and thunder, outfox the fox king, and reach tomorrow before the sun.
traits.name: mercury'sblessing

traits.description: Companion to all woodland creatures, both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures those that respect his domain.
traits.name: sylvanus'blessing

traits.description: Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.
traits.name: vulcan'sfire

traits.description: Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
traits.name: imhotep'swisdom

traits.description: Timmy is overtly concerned with social hitches. he tends to annoy others and can't stand his ex-lovers moving on.
traits.name: petty

traits.description: Timmy has a shining personality. his words can get through to others more than usual.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy Acts abnormally, probably due to their oddly high intelligence. he often makes a larger impact socially... For better or worse. Timmy is so out of the social loop, he doesn't realise when he is being insulted.
traits.name: eccentric2

traits.description: Timmy leads the movement of others well. Colonists around Timmy move faster.
traits.name: conductor

traits.description: Timmy is an effective leader in ranged combat. Colonists around Timmy have better aim.
traits.name: commander

traits.description: Timmy prefers being solitary. he is better at working with plants anyways.
traits.name: hermit

traits.description: Timmy is full of energy. he will randomly gain the Frenzy Go Inspiration, even if he is not happy.
traits.name: peppy

traits.description: Timmy is a genius crafter, and will often have creative inspiration. However, his mind is constantly ticking, making Timmy much more likely to have a mental break.
traits.name: volatilecrafter

traits.description: For whatever reason, everyone seems to really care how Timmy is feeling.
traits.name: luminary

traits.description: Timmy harshly criticizes and dictates the actions of others. Colonists around Timmy move and work faster, but receive a mood debuff from the added stress.
traits.name: tyrannic

traits.description: Timmy loves to take risks and complete quests. he will recieve mood buffs for successful quests, and debuffs for failed quests.
traits.name: venturous

traits.description: Timmy's mind is awaken to the psychic maelstrom.
traits.name: psionic

traits.description: Timmy has a lot of creative power. he is very good at making unique works of art, as well as discovering new ways of solving problems.
traits.name: creative

traits.description: Timmy can't die.
traits.name: immortal

traits.description: Timmy has seen a lot of death and pain. he's not a true psycopath and can enjoy socialization, but he's also not affected by the suffering of others.
traits.name: indifferent

traits.description: Timmy prefers to stay alone - and is very good at that.
traits.name: lonewolf

traits.description: Timmy is a crackshot with a gun - or any ranged weapon for that matter.
traits.name: gunslinger

traits.description: Timmy is skilled at fighting in close-quarters.
traits.name: duelist

traits.description: Timmy is very brave and quite hard to kill.
traits.name: meatshield

traits.description: Timmy has a heavy hand to deliver pain to the enemies.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy is very good at building structures, furniture and machinery.
traits.name: mason

traits.description: Timmy is really good at working with animals.
traits.name: shepherd

traits.description: Timmy is good at hunting the big game, and can also train animals for various tasks.
traits.name: hunter3

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter, and can work both fast and skillfully.

traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of art and beauty.

traits.description: Timmy is good at taking care of wounds and diseases.
traits.name: nurse

traits.description: Timmy is a great cook and can make really delicious dishes.

traits.description: Timmy is quite smart, and can research faster as well as working with medical chemistry.

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent and can research really fast.

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with plants, cutting down trees and harvesting crops.
traits.name: herbalist2

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back, and can move fast even while carrying weight.
traits.name: hauler

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely gorgeous. Even at first glance, people fall in love with the sight of him. However, this overwhelming beauty may allow jealousy and envy to overcome him. Since they hate ruining their look, they can't take much of a beating before breaking down.
traits.name: gorgeous

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely hideous. his face resembles a melted blobfish which got crushed by a meat tenderizer. Most others would rather sniff cow dung within 5 centimeters of it than look at him. The harsh amount of hate they've received over the years has hardened their emotions, and made them tougher.
traits.name: hideous

traits.description: Timmy easily completes any task they are assigned to at an efficient rate but seems to learn skills a lot slower compared to others.
traits.name: hyperfocused

traits.description: Timmy has trouble completing any task they are assigned and will take significantly longer to do so, however, learns at a quicker rate than most others.
traits.name: lethargic

traits.description: Timmy is a speed demon. They move at an extremely fast pace and leaves everyone else in the dust.
traits.name: sprinter

traits.description: Timmy is a marksman, hitting most shots with ease. They rarely miss, but take quite an extended amount of time to aim their shots.
traits.name: deadeye

traits.description: Timmy is as trigger happy as it can get. Whilst they can fire at incredible rates, they don't seem to hit many of their shots.
traits.name: gun-ho

traits.description: Timmy is a natural ranged fighter. They love using ranged weaponry and are skilled in doing so. However, they will be unhappy if holding a melee weapon.
traits.name: archer

traits.description: Timmy adores explosions. They love handling bombs, molotovs, and similar explosives. However, if they are told to carry a different weapon, they will be very upset.
traits.name: demolitionsexpert

traits.description: Timmy has an unnatural ability to extract precious minerals from ores. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: skilledextractor

traits.description: Timmy knows where to mine to get the most ore. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: extractor

traits.description: Timmy is a speedy, albeit rough miner. They will break ores and stone quicker, but ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: clumsyminer

traits.description: Timmy is very impatient when it comes to mining. They will break ores and stone much quicker, but more ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: impatientminer

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely terrified of explosive weapons. If they are holding an explosive weapon, it will drive them mad with fright.
traits.name: ekrixiphobia

traits.description: Timmy is a natural plant worker. They know their way around gardens and farms alike. Taking their time, they can yield a lot more produce out of plants.
traits.name: greentouch

traits.description: While they have the right intentions, Timmy just isn't the great farmer they think they are. They speed through planting and harvesting much quicker than others, but leave behind a lot of produce.
traits.name: browntouch

traits.description: Timmy has everything together most of the time and uses that ability to work much faster.
traits.name: veryorganized

traits.description: Timmy is usually organized when it comes to working, and will work a little faster than others.

traits.description: Timmy loses focus and tools often which leads to their disorganization. They will take longer to finish their tasks.

traits.description: Timmy can barely keep their eyes on their task, and loses the tools for their work relatively often. This leads to a large decrease in productivity.

traits.description: Timmy knows how to prepare food properly, and has a significantly decreased chance of creating poisoned meals regardless of cooking area.

traits.description: Timmy has very shaky hands, and can't butcher meat very easily without guidance.

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher meat without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable flesh.

traits.description: Timmy is a grease monkey. It's almost as if they were born to handle metal and electronics with ease.

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher mechanoids without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable resources.

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.

races.description: Minotaurs, also known as Bullgors, are a massive bull-headed breed of the Beastmen race. Having a large body restricts their use of certain apparel.
races.name: bullgor

races.description: The Cygors are distant cousins of the Minotaurs, but because they hail from the most tainted of all the realms of the Old World, they have diverged greatly from their kin. They are huge, hideously malformed giants, similar in form to Minotaurs, yet each possessed of but a single eye that barely can perceive the mortal world. Cursed with a vision that can only see the winds of magic, Cygors are all quite mad, constantly hunted by ghostly shapes that populate their world.
races.name: cygor

races.description: A gor that has been gifted by the Lord Khorne. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their skills and savagery in battle.
races.name: khornegor

races.description: A gor that has been blessed by Papa Nurgle. They're better fighters than regular gor, tend to recover from injuries and disease faster than most.
races.name: pestigor

races.description: A gor that has received the charms of Slaanesh. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their speed and skill.
races.name: slaangor

races.description: A gor that has received the power and blessing of Tzeentch. They're better fighters than regular gor, and are revered amongst their kin for their magical potential and skills.
races.name: tzaangor

races.description: A common breed of the Beastmen. They make up the bulk of the beastmen herds roaming the lands. Gors tend to be vicious and bloodthirsty, but the rarer beastwomen tends to have a gentler side.
races.name: gor

races.description: A lower breed of beastmen. They are either born as mutants or changed into ones later in their lifes. Outcasts from human society they turn to the gor herds as a lower cast.
races.name: ungor

races.name: dwarf

races.description: Relatively immune to disease due to high constitution. Live for 400 years or so typically, but can be as old as 700 years. Love gold, as well as to mine, build, and craft. Slayers are warriors, they've suffered such a great dishonor that they have decided to seek death at the hands of the biggest, most fearsome enemy they can find.
